### startsWithGlobalOffsetTable() {#a3e9dd2df270e8ff9b688dc40af18e54e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static GlobalOffsetTableExprKind startsWithGlobalOffsetTable (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; Expr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if this expression starts with <em>GLOBAL&#95;OFFSET&#95;TABLE</em> and if it is of the form <em>GLOBAL&#95;OFFSET&#95;TABLE</em>-symbol.

This is needed to support PIC on <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a> i386 as <em>GLOBAL&#95;OFFSET&#95;TABLE</em> is magical. We check only simple case that are know to be used: <em>GLOBAL&#95;OFFSET&#95;TABLE</em> by itself or at the start of a binary expression.

Definition at line <a href="#l00463">463</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/lib/target/x86/mctargetdesc/x86mccodeemitter-cpp">X86MCCodeEmitter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VEX&#95;X: equivalent to REX.X, only used when a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rip-relative addressing is actually relative to the &#42;next&#42; instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since an immediate can follow the mod/rm byte for an instruction, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// means that we need to bias the displacement field of the instruction with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the size of the immediate field. If we have this case, add it into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expression to emit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: rip-relative addressing using immediate displacement values should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not be adjusted, assuming it was the user&#39;s intent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ImmSize = !Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a5f639fdcd3fc673fcbdb47f2e88b2b41">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a3b8bc7d5e78603d3c61a536fd4217eba">X86II::hasImm</a>(TSFlags)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      : 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseRegNo = BaseReg ? getX86RegNum(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>) : -1U;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsAdSize16 = STI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo/#a0ad14e9a81239b54fd64089b3290bfde">hasFeature</a>(X86::Is32Bit) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    (TSFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285ea50c2f31aba037c4ec3acceb23258ef8f">X86II::AdSizeMask</a>) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#a74027296f130de8cbbe7bc543dc4285eab2eec66c1c52ab7579af0cb9130b8ab5">X86II::AdSize16</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 16-bit addressing forms of the ModR/M byte have a different encoding for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the R/M field and are far more limited in which registers can be used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsAdSize16 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86-mc/#a4c4cc9236e2a4f99e7e616a7f6740f16">X86&#95;MC::is16BitMemOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, STI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BaseReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 32-bit addressing, the row and column values in Table 2-2 are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basically the same. It&#39;s AX/CX/DX/BX/SP/BP/SI/DI in that order, with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// some special cases. And getX86RegNum reflects that numbering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 16-bit addressing it&#39;s more fun, as shown in the SDM Vol 2A,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Table 2-1 &quot;16-Bit Addressing Forms with the ModR/M byte&quot;. We can only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use SI/DI/BP/BX, which have &quot;row&quot; values 4-7 in no particular order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while values 0-3 indicate the allowed combinations (base+index) of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// those: 0 for BX+SI, 1 for BX+DI, 2 for BP+SI, 3 for BP+DI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R16Table&#91;&#93; is a lookup from the normal RegNo, to the row values from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Table 2-1 for 16-bit addressing modes. Where zero means disallowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R16Table&#91;&#93; = &#123;0, 0, 0, 7, 0, 6, 4, 5&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RMfield = R16Table&#91;BaseRegNo&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RMfield &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid 16-bit base register&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IndexReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a94abf618eb8001b802910ab872a7d1d9">getReg</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IndexReg16 = R16Table&#91;getX86RegNum(IndexReg)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(IndexReg16 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid 16-bit index register&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must have one of SI/DI (4,5), and one of BP/BX (6,7).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((IndexReg16 ^ RMfield) &amp; 2) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid 16-bit base/index register combination&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Scale.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid scale for 16-bit memory reference&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow base/index to appear in either order (although GAS doesn&#39;t).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IndexReg16 &amp; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RMfield = (RMfield &amp; 1) | ((7 - IndexReg16) &lt;&lt; 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RMfield = (IndexReg16 &amp; 1) | ((7 - RMfield) &lt;&lt; 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a5f639fdcd3fc673fcbdb47f2e88b2b41">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>() == 0 &amp;&amp; RMfield != 6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no displacement; just the register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86mccodeemitter-cpp-/#ab04a741cd062f6096b5181ada9b27489">emitByte</a>(<a href="#a624d914db11b33bdb836e37b51b9d2f5">modRMByte</a>(0, RegOpcodeField, RMfield), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the &#91;REG&#93;+disp8 form, including for &#91;BP&#93; which cannot be encoded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86mccodeemitter-cpp-/#ab04a741cd062f6096b5181ada9b27489">emitByte</a>(<a href="#a624d914db11b33bdb836e37b51b9d2f5">modRMByte</a>(1, RegOpcodeField, RMfield), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">        emitImmediate(Disp, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getLoc(), 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a4aee2a3e203379bbb0c9639d4ef31b6e">FK&#95;Data&#95;1</a>, StartByte, CB, Fixups);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the &#91;REG&#93;+disp16 case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86mccodeemitter-cpp-/#ab04a741cd062f6096b5181ada9b27489">emitByte</a>(<a href="#a624d914db11b33bdb836e37b51b9d2f5">modRMByte</a>(2, RegOpcodeField, RMfield), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!IndexReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a94abf618eb8001b802910ab872a7d1d9">getReg</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected index register!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no BaseReg; this is the plain &#91;disp16&#93; case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86mccodeemitter-cpp-/#ab04a741cd062f6096b5181ada9b27489">emitByte</a>(<a href="#a624d914db11b33bdb836e37b51b9d2f5">modRMByte</a>(0, RegOpcodeField, 6), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit 16-bit displacement for plain disp16 or &#91;REG&#93;+disp16 cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    emitImmediate(Disp, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getLoc(), 2, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58afe607fbae154a24e4b463cf9fd5916f7">FK&#95;Data&#95;2</a>, StartByte, CB, Fixups);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for presence of &#123;disp8&#125; or &#123;disp32&#125; pseudo prefixes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseDisp8 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getFlags() &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#ab45f29eafca4acc2a7240156af5ec350a52397487434744d19d6d9f30a549c68e">X86::IP&#95;USE&#95;DISP8</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseDisp32 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getFlags() &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#ab45f29eafca4acc2a7240156af5ec350a79e1d8eec35d00c93ca8ae774d1c8fe7">X86::IP&#95;USE&#95;DISP32</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only allow no displacement if no pseudo prefix is present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowNoDisp = !UseDisp8 &amp;&amp; !UseDisp32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Disp8 is allowed unless the &#123;disp32&#125; prefix is present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowDisp8 = !UseDisp32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine whether a SIB byte is needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ForceSIB &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#ab9df9a1addf48641771cbae1137661aa">X86II::needSIB</a>(BaseReg, IndexReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a94abf618eb8001b802910ab872a7d1d9">getReg</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   STI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo/#a0ad14e9a81239b54fd64089b3290bfde">hasFeature</a>(X86::Is64Bit))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BaseReg) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;disp32&#93;     in X86-32 mode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86mccodeemitter-cpp-/#ab04a741cd062f6096b5181ada9b27489">emitByte</a>(<a href="#a624d914db11b33bdb836e37b51b9d2f5">modRMByte</a>(0, RegOpcodeField, 5), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">      emitImmediate(Disp, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getLoc(), 4, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a5d58ab615cde98af13deb16dbc09f42d">FK&#95;Data&#95;4</a>, StartByte, CB, Fixups);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the base is not EBP/ESP/R12/R13/R20/R21/R28/R29 and there is no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// displacement, use simple indirect register encoding, this handles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addresses like &#91;EAX&#93;. The encoding for &#91;EBP&#93;, &#91;R13&#93;, &#91;R20&#93;, &#91;R21&#93;, &#91;R28&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or &#91;R29&#93; with no displacement means &#91;disp32&#93; so we handle it by emitting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a displacement of 0 later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BaseRegNo != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/n86/#a439ba30f72ab4af827a8f6b532b4c936a85b6ab9236a61c8ddb3dd0928a8795c6">N86::EBP</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a5f639fdcd3fc673fcbdb47f2e88b2b41">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>() == 0 &amp;&amp; AllowNoDisp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86mccodeemitter-cpp-/#ab04a741cd062f6096b5181ada9b27489">emitByte</a>(<a href="#a624d914db11b33bdb836e37b51b9d2f5">modRMByte</a>(0, RegOpcodeField, BaseRegNo), CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the displacement is @tlscall, treat it as a zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ae23b2e8269fe15dbe5ebb3394438960c">isExpr</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Sym = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;MCSymbolRefExpr&gt;</a>(Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ac9408fbc60922d24b01c1efcbd4ba52b">getExpr</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sym &amp;&amp; Sym-&gt;getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a5c463f6352570ee778c35c40949c4985a03bfc9e15ea1f28db8231b2259bac14d">MCSymbolRefExpr::VK&#95;TLSCALL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is exclusively used by call &#42;a@tlscall(base). The relocation</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AVX instructions are encoded using an encoding scheme that combines</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prefix bytes, opcode extension field, operand encoding fields, and vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// length encoding capability into a new prefix, referred to as VEX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The majority of the AVX-512 family of instructions (operating on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 512/256/128-bit vector register operands) are encoded using a new prefix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (called EVEX).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XOP is a revised subset of what was originally intended as SSE5. It was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changed to be similar but not overlapping with AVX.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Emit segment override opcode prefix as needed.</span></CodeLine>
